Dear students, hello and welcome to the course "Methods and tools for sustainability assessment",
more information on the course will be posted soon. The course will be taught in English.
This course will be offered in the summer semester of 2023. The first lecture will be held on 2 May 2023 at 8:15 in room H3010.
The course is held every Tuesday from 8:15 to 11:45.
